#summary Roadmap and Directions
= Roadmap and Directions =
== First release 0.0.1 ==
 * Simple and first stack based VM interpreter.
 * Core libraries, Regexp, Port, CGI, traditional macro and continuation.
== by version 0.1.0 ==
 * [R6RS] List utilities.
 * [R6RS] Records.
 * [R6RS] Exception and conditions.
 * [R6RS] Library form.
 * [R6RS] eval *done*
== by version 0.2.0 ==
 * [R6RS] Hashtables.
 * [R6RS] I/O.
 * [R6RS] Bytevectors.
== by version 0.3.0 ==
 * [R6RS] enumerations
 * [R6RS] syntax-case.
== by version 0.4.0 ==
 * [R6RS] Numeric tower with Bignum.
 * Cover [R6RS] specfications.
== by version 0.5.0 ==
 * Debugging features.
== by version 0.6.0 ==
 * GUI library.
== by version 0.7.0 ==
 * Object system.

== by version 1.0 ==
 * Stabilize
